posts.author: TheSquid
posts.content:
Hello
Does anyone know if offensive epic spells (Greater Ruin and Hellball) interact with mantles? My take is that since they don't check for SR, they should ignore mantles entirely, but I have not tested.
Thanks!

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
They ignore Mantles.

They are technically not really considered spells, but are feat-based effects.
